channel.title: 彭博-市场
channel.description: 这是一个追踪彭博-市场news的种子

item.title: 一场关于马来西亚最富有的家族之一如何创造财富的争斗在半个地球之外的瑞士法庭接近尾声。对于拥有超过 2 万亿美元全球财富的瑞士来说，这一判决可能是一个重要的决定。
item.description:
A fight over how one of Malaysia's richest families made its wealth is nearing its end half a world away in a Swiss court.

The verdict may be an important decision for Switzerland, home to more than $2 trillion of global fortunes https://t.co/AfMDmAZn1b

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 去年，餐厅、商店和酒吧新开业数量激增，推高了伦敦旅游热点地区的租金，使房东沙夫茨伯里公司（Shaftesbury）受益匪浅。
item.description:
A surge of new restaurant, shop and bar openings helped push rents in London’s tourist hot spots higher last year, boosting landlord Shaftesbury https://t.co/Yqx1V2xI7U

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: Grifols 的利润大幅增长 27%，在做空机构指控其欺诈行为导致公司价值缩水数十亿欧元后，该公司将重心重新转移到了陷入困境的医疗保健公司的发展前景上。
item.description:
Grifols's profit jumps 27%, shifting the focus back to the embattled healthcare company’s growth prospects after a short-seller’s allegations of fraud wiped billions of euros off its value https://t.co/JoLpddqhKe

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 瑞典去年最后一个季度的产出意外萎缩，打破了北欧最大经济体摆脱短暂衰退的说法
item.description:
Sweden’s output unexpectedly contracted in the final quarter of last year, upending a narrative in which the biggest Nordic economy had escaped a short-lived recession https://t.co/ehCkacey4v

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: Man Group 的客户一年多来首次从全球最大的上市对冲基金公司撤资
item.description:
Man Group’s clients pulled funds from the world’s biggest publicly listed hedge fund firm for the first quarter in over a year https://t.co/HI61iYaLcz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 英国股票看起来很便宜，金边债券的收益率超过 4%，优质公司债券的收益率超过 5%，英镑看起来会走强。英镑资产提供了一个低压力的避风港，@marcusashworth 写道（通过 @观点）
item.description:
UK stocks look cheap, gilts offer yields of more than 4%, high-quality corporate bonds are available at more than 5% and the pound looks set to strengthen. Sterling assets offer a low-stress haven, @marcusashworth writes (via @opinion) https://t.co/XYTOK5y6rS

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 土耳其 1.1 万亿美元的经济增长速度远超预期，避免了在央行大规模加息的两个季度中出现经济萎缩的情况
item.description:
Turkey’s $1.1 trillion economy grows much faster than forecast, avoiding a contraction during a two-quarter stretch when the central bank delivered the bulk of its massive interest-rate hikes https://t.co/iA4OxOnUe5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 国泰航空旗下廉价航空公司香港快运因面临新飞机交付延迟的前景，"小部分 "机票暂缓发售
item.description:
Cathay Pacific’s budget carrier HK Express is holding back “a small percentage” of tickets from sale as it deals with the prospect of new plane delivery delays https://t.co/VaBFYVAoWn

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 以下是伦敦金融城及其他地区的最新新闻和见解

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据说索尼已经撤回了将其印度业务与 Zee Entertainment 合并的协议，从而迈出了废除一项长达两年之久的计划的最后一步，该计划旨在创建一个价值 100 亿美元的媒体巨头。
item.description:
Sony is said to have withdrawn the agreement to merge its India operations with Zee Entertainment, taking the final step in scrapping a two-year-old plan that sought to create a $10 billion media giant https://t.co/vFriXWBFYg

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 由于金属价格下跌，安帕拉铂金公司的利润骤降 88%。这家总部位于约翰内斯堡的矿商预计 2024 年 "将是困难的一年"。
item.description:
Impala Platinum's profit plunges 88% as metal prices sink. The Johannesburg-based miner expects 2024 “to be a difficult year" https://t.co/ZfjnSRBg8r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 日本央行可能更接近于结束全球最后一次负利率状态
item.description:
The Bank of Japan may be closer to ending the world’s last-remaining negative rates https://t.co/3eoMKqJMkI

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 摩尔多瓦分离地区在向俄罗斯寻求不明帮助后，面临局势升级的风险
item.description:
A Moldovan breakaway region risks potential escalation, after calling on Russia for unspecified help https://t.co/plRFqu4Lqo

item.title: 百威啤酒计划扩大其高端产品在中国的销售，抓住消费者在经济不景气的情况下对生活小奢侈的渴望。
item.description:
Budweiser plans to expand sales of its premium products in China, seizing on consumers’ desire for life’s little luxuries in a gloomy economy https://t.co/sfFmBu0hMp

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.description:
China is facing “unprecedented risks and challenges” in safeguarding national secrets, a government agency says https://t.co/sGNMeeZ30S

Crypto hedge fund managers are forgoing sleep and business trips to cope with the meltup in Bitcoin https://t.co/JUcAHupjL4

item.title: 基辅准备限制向欧盟的出口激增，以此缓解波兰农民日益增长的担忧
item.description:
Kyiv is prepared to limit surges in exports into the European Union as a way to allay mounting concerns of Polish farmers https://t.co/mUTjMpFveJ

item.title: @johnauthers 说："市场羊群效应无处不在，不仅仅是美国。但全球指数为 "华丽七国 "提供了一个不那么集中的替代选择
item.description:
Market herding is everywhere, not just the US, says @johnauthers. But global indexes offer a less-concentrated alternative to the Magnificent Seven https://t.co/mb5hFZ8lV5

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据《南华早报》报道，中国外交部长王毅应邀于 3 月下半月对澳大利亚进行为期两天的访问
item.description:
China’s Foreign Minister Wang Yi has been invited to Australia for a two-day visit in the second half of March, the SCMP reports https://t.co/gg8Jo3rvzy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: @PaulJDavies 写道："欧洲贷款机构购买更多信贷保险，但这并不意味着那些对 2008 年记忆犹新的投资者会恐慌。
item.description:
European lenders buying more credit insurance is no reason for investors with memories of 2008 to panic, writes @PaulJDavies https://t.co/sBfcQXMPTz

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 您会削减哪些税收？玩彭博社的预算游戏，看看您能否避免市场崩溃
item.description:
What taxes would you cut? Play Bloomberg's budget game and see if you can avoid crashing the markets https://t.co/e94jANZKYy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 立法者表示，美国国会领导人已达成协议，避免3月2日政府部分关门，并为政府部分部门提供资金至9月30日。
item.description:
US congressional leaders have reached a deal to avoid a March 2 partial government shutdown and fund parts of the government through Sept. 30, lawmakers said. https://t.co/sIrvuHu22r

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 爆料：据《华尔街日报》报道，美国证券交易委员会正在调查 OpenAI 投资者是否被误导，并正在审查 Sam Altman 过去的通信记录
item.description:
BREAKING: The US SEC is probing whether OpenAI investors were misled and is reviewing Sam Altman's past communications, WSJ reports https://t.co/dznDcWX4b3 pic.twitter.com/41dQnr7PBJ

— Bloomberg (@business) February 29, 2024

item.title: 中国林业退休官员用贿赂款购买 13 套住房的案件在中国互联网上疯传。
item.description:
The case of a retired Chinese forestry official who bought 13 houses using bribe money has gone viral on the country’s internet after the top graft fighter made his case public https://t.co/FFRJVWhRVB

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 中国超长期债券加速反弹，表明投资者押注新的货币宽松政策将巩固经济复苏
item.description:
A rally in China’s ultra-long bonds is accelerating, suggesting investors are betting on fresh monetary easing to cement a recovery https://t.co/JHsEClyFy3

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 中国国家主席习近平推动在内陆沙漠地区建设大规模可再生能源设施，促进了经济增长。
item.description:
China installed more solar panels in power plants than on rooftops last year for the first time since 2020 as President Xi Jinping’s push to build large-scale renewable facilities in inland deserts boosted growth https://t.co/4MVQNOufga

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: Citadel Securities 已聘请前千禧管理公司高管 Vikesh Kotecha 担任亚太区主管
item.description:
Citadel Securities has hired Vikesh Kotecha, a former Millennium Management executive, as its Asia-Pacific head https://t.co/H8qvUKAFcy

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024

item.title: 据说摩根大通正在与 FS Investments 和 Octagon Credit Investors 深入讨论合作事宜，以扩大其在 1.7 万亿美元私人信贷市场的影响力
item.description:
JPMorgan is said to be in advanced discussions to partner with FS Investments and Octagon Credit Investors to expand its reach in the $1.7 trillion private credit market https://t.co/Icyo8VA2Bo

— Bloomberg Markets (@markets) February 29, 2024
